oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Protocol for systematic reviews on risk factors and preventive interventions for post Covid-19 condition
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pillay, Jennifer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a protocol for systematic reviews on risk factors and preventive interventions for post Covid-19 condition, conducted in collaboration with the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) and the Canadian Agency for Drugs and Technologies in Health (CADTH)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
post Covid-19 condition
long-Covid
risk factors
prevention
